info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:49PM MDT until July 08 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL MISSOULA COUNTY... At 348 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wye, or 10 miles northwest of Missoula, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. Golf ball size hail has been reported near the Wye SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Missoula and Wye. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
